fko.chessly.player.computer.PulseEngine

Class Bitboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • fko.chessly.player.computer.PulseEngine.Bitboard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    final class Bitboard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Bitboard stores squares as bits in a 64-bit long. We provide methods to convert bit squares to 0x88 squares and vice versa.
